^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FirmwareInventory.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a resource of type SmcFirmwareInventoryCollection.

IPMIConfig.description: A reference to the IPMI configuration service.
IPMIConfig.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a reference to a IPMI configuration service.

SSLCert.description: A reference to the SSL certificate service.
SSLCert.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a reference to a SSL certificate service which is responsible for represent current certification valid and through date and for update.
